I.name: Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kled''' rides his semi-trusty mount, '''Skaarl'''. While {{sbc|Mounted}}, all damage dealt to the duo is suffered by '''Skaarl''', who has {{as|{{pp|{{ccd|Kled & Skaarl|hp_base}}+{{ccd|Kled & Skaarl|hp_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))}} '''base''' health}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' health)}}. Percent-health effects consider '''Kled & Skaarl's''' combined {{as|'''maximum''' health}}.

Being reduced to {{as|{{sti|health|0 health}}}} causes '''Skaarl''' to flee, forcing '''Kled''' to be {{sbc|Dismounted}}, with all damage in excess of '''Skaarl's''' {{as|health}} being ignored. Upon dismounting, '''Kled''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} toward his nexus, though not through terrain, {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} himself of all {{tip|crowd control}} and becomes {{tip|lockout|unable to act}}, {{tip|untargetable}}, and {{tip|cc-immune|immune to crowd control}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, during which he also {{tip|damage reduction|reduces}} all incoming damage received by 100%.

While '''Kled''' is {{sbc|Dismounted}}, his {{as|'''base''' health}} and {{as|'''base''' movement speed}} are reduced, his {{sti|attack range|'''base''' attack range}} is increased, ''{{ai|Bear Trap on a Rope|Kled}}'' is replaced with ''{{ai|Pocket Pistol|Kled}}'', and ''{{ai|Jousting|Kled}}'' and ''{{ai|Chaaaaaaaarge!!!|Kled}}'' become unusable.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Kled rides his semi-trusty mount, Skaarl. While Mounted, all damage dealt to the duo is suffered by Skaarl, who has Unknown value: ccd / Kled & Skaarl / hp_base+Unknown value: ccd / Kled & Skaarl / hp_lvl*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)) âˆ’ undefined (based on level) base health (+ 100% bonus health). Percent-health effects consider Kled & Skaarl's combined maximum health.
Being reduced to 0 health causes Skaarl to flee, forcing Kled to be Dismounted, with all damage in excess of Skaarl's health being ignored. Upon dismounting, Kled dashes toward his nexus, though not through terrain, cleanses himself of all crowd control and becomes unable to act, untargetable, and immune to crowd control for 0.5 seconds, during which he also reduces all incoming damage received by 100%.
While Kled is Dismounted, his base health and base movement speed are reduced, his base attack range is increased, Kled's Bear Trap on a Rope is replaced with Kled's Pocket Pistol, and Kled's Jousting and Kled's Chaaaaaaaarge!!! become unusable.
I.notes:
* It is possible for the [[Nexus Obelisk]] to not be able to bring '''Kled''' down from '''Skaarl''' for a few seconds, even if '''Skaarl''' has no health.
* '''Kled's''' health is rounded up while '''Skaarl's''' health is rounded down.
* {{stil|Health regeneration}} only regenerates '''Kled's''' or '''Skaarl's''' health, not both.
* The only {{tip|crowd control}} status which '''Kled's''' dismount does not dispel is {{ai|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}}.

Q.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kled''' throws a bear trap in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit, increased by 50% against {{tip|minion|minions}} and small {{tip|monsters}}. The bear trap collides against the first enemy {{tip|champion}} or large {{tip|monster}} hit, forming a {{tip|tether}} with '''Kled''' that {{tip|true sight|reveals}} the target.

The tether's radius shrinks over {{fd|1.75}} seconds, and if it is not broken by the end of its duration, '''Kled''' {{tip|airborne|pulls}} the target {{tt|100|Estimated}} units toward him, deals {{as|physical damage}}, inflicts 40% {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 5 seconds, and {{tip|slow|slows}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''Bear Trap on a Rope can be cast while {{ai|Jousting|Kled}}.''
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kled throws a bear trap in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit, increased by 50% against minions and small monsters. The bear trap collides against the first enemy champion or large monster hit, forming a tether with Kled that reveals the target.
The tether's radius shrinks over 1.75 seconds, and if it is not broken by the end of its duration, Kled pulls the target 100 units toward him, deals physical damage, inflicts 40% Grievous Wounds for 5 seconds, and slows them for 1.5 seconds.
Bear Trap on a Rope can be cast while Kled's Jousting.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 130}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minion and Small Monster Damage|{{ap|30*1.5 to 130*1.5}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 260}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|30+60 to 130+260}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|40 to 60}}%}}
Q.notes:
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* ''Bear Trap on a Rope'' will not {{tip|airborne|pull}} the target if they are in {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}}.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD)
  • Minion and Small Monster Damage: (+ 90% bonus AD)

• Physical Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ 180% bonus AD)
  • Slow: %

E1.name: Jousting
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skaarl''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies he passes through and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} {{tip|minion|minions}} and small {{tip|monster|monsters}} hit towards them.

Upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}} or large {{tip|monster}}, '''Skaarl''' {{tip|dashes}} a fixed {{tt|200|estimated}}-units through them, marking them for 3 seconds, during which they are {{tip|true sight|revealed}}. After the dash ends, the duo gain {{sti|ms|{{as|50% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 1 second. ''Jousting'' can be recast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds of the first dash ending while the target is marked.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Skaarl''' consumes the mark to {{tip|dash}} through the marked target.
The mark will remain even if the target dies, and ends prematurely if the duo are too far away or '''Kled''' ''{{ai|Dismounted Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|dismounts}}''.
''{{ai|Bear Trap on a Rope|Kled}}'' and ''{{ai|Chaaaaaaaarge!!!|Kled}}'' can be cast during either of the dashes.
E1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Skaarl dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through and pulling minions and small monsters hit towards them.
Upon hitting an enemy champion or large monster, Skaarl dashes a fixed 200-units through them, marking them for 3 seconds, during which they are revealed. After the dash ends, the duo gain 50% bonus movement speed for 1 second. Jousting can be recast after 0.5 seconds of the first dash ending while the target is marked.
Recast: Skaarl consumes the mark to dash through the marked target.
The mark will remain even if the target dies, and ends prematurely if the duo are too far away or Kled Kled's dismounts.
Kled's Bear Trap on a Rope and Kled's Chaaaaaaaarge!!! can be cast during either of the dashes.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|35 to 135}} {{as|(+ 65% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|35*2 to 135*2}} {{as|(+ 130% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 65% bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ 130% bonus AD)

R1.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kled''' & '''Skaarl''' charge toward the target location, automatically navigating terrain along the way, during which they're {{tip|ghosted}} and {{tip|Cc-immune|immune to crowd control}}. If the charge does not complete within 15 seconds, it will end prematurely. The charge is interrupted instantly if '''Kled''' ''{{ai|Dismounted Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|dismounts}}'' during it.

While charging, the duo gain {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and a {{tip|shield}} for every {{fd|0.25}} seconds of traveling, up to {{tt|{{as|950 '''total''' movement speed|ms}}|after movement speed soft caps}} over 3 seconds and {{pp|type=time traveling|key=%|label=Shield Percentage|10 to 100 for 10|0 to 2.25|formula=('''maximum''' shield)/10*((time+0.25)/0.25). ''This is capped at 2.25 seconds of time active.''}} of the '''maximum''' shield amount over {{fd|2.25}} seconds respectively. The shield lasts for 2 seconds upon finishing the charge. The duo trails a directional draft in their wake, lasting 9 seconds. Allied champions following the draft gain ''Mr. Kled's Wild Ride''.
{{sbc|Mr. Kled's Wild Ride:}} Gain {{tt|{{as|650 '''total''' movement speed|ms}}|after movement speed soft caps}}.

'''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the first enemy champion in range, colliding with the first {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champion on the way, or the main target, to {{tip|airborne|knock them back}} {{tt|100|Estimated}} units, though not through terrain, and deal {{as|physical damage}}, increased by {{pp|type=time traveling|key=%|label=Damage Increase|0 to 200 for 26|0 to 4|formula=8% increase per 0.16 seconds. ''This is capped at 4 seconds of time active.''}}.
R1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kled & Skaarl charge toward the target location, automatically navigating terrain along the way, during which they're ghosted and immune to crowd control. If the charge does not complete within 15 seconds, it will end prematurely. The charge is interrupted instantly if Kled Kled's dismounts during it.
While charging, the duo gain bonus movement speed and a shield for every 0.25 seconds of traveling, up to 950 total movement speed over 3 seconds and 0 to 2.25 â€’ undefined of the maximum shield amount over 2.25 seconds respectively. The shield lasts for 2 seconds upon finishing the charge. The duo trails a directional draft in their wake, lasting 9 seconds. Allied champions following the draft gain Mr. Kled's Wild Ride.
Mr. Kled's Wild Ride: Gain 650 total movement speed.
Skaarl dashes to the first enemy champion in range, colliding with the first visible enemy champion on the way, or the main target, to knock them back 100 units, though not through terrain, and deal physical damage, increased by 0 to 4 â€’ undefined.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Shield|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Shield|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 300% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

{{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|4 to 6}}% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Maximum Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|4*3 to 6*3}}% {{as|(+ 12% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
R1.notes:
* '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' will track the target if they change locations.
** They will dash to the target's previous location if the target is too far away or moves beyond {{tt|2500|Estimated}} units.
* During the charge the duo gain:
** (950{{minus}}({{tt|'''current''' movement speed|after movement speed soft caps}})){{divided by}}12{{times}}(time{{divided by}}{{fd|0.25}}) {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}
* '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' are {{tip|cc-immune|immune to crowd control}} during the charge as well while dashing to the target.
* The bonus movement speed is not affected by [[movement speed|movement speed caps]].
* The charge will not give any movement speed to '''Kled''' if he has more than {{tt|1440|Raw movement speed}} movement speed.
* The trail will not give '''Kled''' and his allies any movement speed if they have more than {{tt|840|Raw movement speed}} movement speed.
* Movement speed is granted merely by facing the direction of the draft.
* Enemies gain partial vision of '''Kled''' when he charges nearby.
* '''Kled''' will re-path if his current pathing is blocked by a newly created terrain (either player created or by the {{ui|Mountain Drake|Mountainous Rift}}).
* The charge will not be interrupted if '''Kled's''' location changes drastically.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Kled''' is charging:
{{ct|attack=false|move=	Allowed, but cannot input movement commands.|cast=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=true, false, false, false, false, false, false|interrupts=false}}
